title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the db field contents correctly.
EB: The dynamic text element should display the contents of the db field according to the content type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:1. Create a db field with three types of content:  
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.  
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags.  
   c) Text with RTF tags.  
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.  
3. Observe that the dynamic text element does not correctly display the contents based on the content type.
